name: 'The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time' 3 Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who from "The Adventure of Link" (NES) do you fight in the Water Temple to get your Longshot?
questions.explanation:
Shadow Link.

	Shadow Link or Dark Link is fought in the Water Temple.  He was also the final boss of "The Legend of Zelda 2: The Adventure of Link" for NES.

questions.text: What do you shoot to get the Fire Arrow?
questions.explanation:
The Sun.

	You shoot the sun where it tells you to at Lake Hylia.  Use it to light torches, melt ice, and incinerate enemies for the cost of an arrow and a bit of magic.

questions.text: What song do you need to enter the well in Kakariko Village?
questions.explanation:
The Song of Storms.

	You must play the "Song of Storms" to drain the well.  This also speeds up the windmill and drives the music box man crazy.  You need into the well for the Lens of Truth.

questions.text: What musical instrument does the boss of the Shadow Temple play?
questions.explanation:
Bongo.

	He plays the bongo.  It's sort of a giveaway seeing as the boss's name is Bongo Bongo.  To beat him, you'll need the Lens of Truth, and your bow.

questions.text: What is the prize at the end of the Gerudo Training Grounds?
questions.explanation:
Ice Arrow.

	Ironically, the desert area is home to the Ice Arrow which you'll need to complete several tasks for such as kill two Dinofols in 1:30, or two Stalfos in a minute.  Cinch.

questions.text: Name one of the Twinrova sisters of the Spirit Temple.
questions.explanation:
Koume & Kotake.

	Koume and Kotake are the Twinrova Sisters of the Spirit Temple and your boss for the 5th and final temple.  Once beaten, you can get the Spirit Medallion from the sage Nabooru.

questions.text: What colour is the Shadow Medallion?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	Interestingly, the Shadow Medallion you earn from Impa is a deep purple.  You need to obviously kill Bongo Bongo for it in the Shadow Temple.

questions.text: As you enter Ganon's Castle, what is the first wing (barrier) to your right?
questions.explanation:
Forest.

	The Forest Barrier is to your right, and it should be the first completed.  You'll need to use your hookshot for this barrier.  To destroy the orb in the final room, shoot a light arrow through it.

questions.text: Which wing (barrier) do you need to use the Golden Gauntlets to enter?
questions.explanation:
Light.

	You use the gauntlets to lift a giant granite pillar in front of the Light door.  This is probably the easiest of dungeons.  In one room, you play Zelda's Lullaby for a key.

questions.text: What weapon is used to strike the final blow on Ganon?
questions.explanation:
Master Sword.

	After the long demanding battle against Ganon's two forms, and the race through the crumbling castle, The all-fabled Master Sword completes your game in one final strike.   Congrats on finishing the game.
